Question: Fritz Perls, who helped to develop Gestalt therapy, was influenced by Reich, Jung and this person.
Hints: This person acknowledged that his use of the term Id (das Es, "the It") derives from the writings of Georg Groddeck.
This person sought to anchor this pattern of development in the dynamics of the mind.
Patients were generally unconvinced that their experiences of this person's clinical procedure indicated actual sexual abuse.
